version_description:
• Morph: Apply the Morph transition to easily move several objects at once. 
• Annotate with Ink: With the tools on the new Draw tab, use your pen, finger, or Apple Pencil to write, draw, and highlight. (iPad only) 
• 3D Touch: Use 3D Touch from the home screen to quickly create or open a file. (iPhone 6s or 6s Plus only) 
• Fonts from the cloud: Download fonts on demand, when you need them. 
• Spotlight search: Quickly find recently opened presentations in Spotlight. (iOS 9 required)

• Box works with Office: Your file storage options are growing! Now store and access your Office files on Box.
• Discover more Office apps: PowerPoint now makes it easy for you to discover and quickly install all the Office apps available for your iPhone and iPad.
• Save your slideshow annotations: Now keep the annotations and drawings you create during slideshow and presenter view. (For Office 365 subscribers only)

• Box works with Office: Your file storage options are growing! Now store and access your Office files on Box.
• Discover more Office apps: PowerPoint now makes it easy for you to discover and quickly install all the Office apps available for your iPhone and iPad.
• Save your slideshow annotations: Now keep the annotations and drawings you create during slideshow and presenter view. (For Office 365 subscribers only)
• Bug fixes
Edit with speed! Have quick access to commands that make sense in the moment. (iPhone only)

• Enjoy even more flexibility for storing and accessing your Office files, with Egnyte and Learnium.
• If a slide contains a video that has closed captions or multiple audio tracks, you can now play these tracks in your slideshow.
• You can now export a presentation to the OpenDocument Presentation (.odp) format.

• Automatically transform your drawings into shapes.
• Print your presentations from the app of your choice.
• See presentations others have recently shared with you, and search directly on the Shared and Recent tabs.
• Bug fixes

•Use the Find icon on the ribbon to search for any text in your presentation.
•Use your finger to write, draw and highlight with the tools in the new Draw tab (iPhone only).
•Enjoy even more flexibility for storing and accessing your presentations with Citrix.

﻿•In presenter view, point your phone at the screen, then press and hold in the notes area to turn your device into a laser pointer. For Office 365 subscribers only. iPhone Only.
•Enjoy even more flexibility for storing and accessing your Office files with Edmodo and 腾讯微云
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
﻿- Improved support for using VoiceOver and other assistive technology to read and edit presentations.
-Move, resize, or format multiple objects at once. Tap and hold, then tap another object.
• Bug fixes

﻿Thank you for using PowerPoint. 

We regularly release updates to the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for speed and reliability.

Did you know that with an Office 365 subscription, you can unlock the full power of Office across all of your devices? Find special offers in the app.

• PowerPoint Designer: You supply the words and pictures, we'll supply high-quality, professional design ideas for your slides. (For iPad.) (For Office 365 subscribers only.)
• Shared Document Notifications: No need to keep checking your shared document. We'll send you a notification when there's activity.
• Bug fixes

• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Ink that sparkles: Add some whimsy while you're writing with ink. Just toggle on "Sparkle Animation" in the Pen options and you'll get sparkles as you write.
• Pick Your Destination: Use the Move command to easily move your cloud-based files from one folder to another.
• Fixes issues with organization accounts unable to complete activation, sign in or MAM registration.
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes

• Redesigned From Scratch: We have redesigned the app to be simpler, faster and more beautiful than before.
• Updated Alt Text Pane: Make your content more accessible by adding helpful captions or even mark elements as decorative.
• Bug fixes

Add and Switch Between Accounts:  Add multiple work or personal accounts to your PowerPoint app, and easily switch between them.

Use a Pointing Device on iPad : Connect a trackpad or mouse to your iPad and you’ll get rich visual feedback and just the right level of precision needed to enhance your productivity.

Use a Pointing Device: Connect a trackpad or mouse to your iPad for another way to interact with PowerPoint.
Rehearse your Presentation with Presenter Coach: Get feedback on the things that help keep an audience engaged — like pacing, pitch, filler words, sensitive phrases, and more.

Get to Your Files Faster: Enjoy the new simplified Home experience within PowerPoint for iPad, along with quick access to your relevant files.

Government customers: Apply sensitivity labels to your documents and emails: Sensitivity labeling features are now available for customers in the GCC and GCC-H environments (learn more - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/sensitivity-labels).
3D Model Support: Rotate and interact with your 3D models
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
Show Your Pride: Celebrate Pride with the special theme inspired by the flags of the LGBTQI+ communities.
Tell your stories with animated GIFs: Animated GIFs are now supported in the Office editor - your documents just got snazzier.
Quickly Access Useful Commands: Open the context menu with just one click using a mouse or trackpad.

View or Edit Your Files Offline: Mark your files as available offline, so you can access them even if you aren't connected to the internet.

M365 Premium Content Picker: Explore a growing library of royalty-free stock images, icons, stickers and more
Addresses a stability issue when using organizational accounts.
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes
PowerPoint on iPad Has a New Look: Check out the new ribbon and commands design and let us know what you think.
• Bug fixes
